PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValveTypeFaucet
PropertySetDef.Definition: A small diameter valve, with a free outlet, from which water is drawn.

PropertyDef.Name: FaucetFunction
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the operating temperature of a faucet that may be specified.

PropertyDef.Name: FaucetOperation
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the range of ways in which a faucet can be operated that may be specified where:\X\0D \X\0D CeramicDisc: Quick action faucet with a ceramic seal to open or close the orifice\X\0D .\X\0D LeverHandle: Quick action faucet that is operated by a lever handle\X\0D .\X\0D NonConcussiveSelfClosing:\X\09 Self closing faucet that does not induce surge pressure\X\0D .\X\0D QuarterTurn: Quick action faucet that can be fully opened or shut by turning the operating mechanism through 90 degrees.\X\0D QuickAction: Faucet that can be opened or closed fully with a single small movement of the operating mechanism\X\0D .\X\0D ScrewDown: Faucet in which a plate or disc is moved, by the rotation of a screwed spindle, to close or open the orifice.\X\0D SelfClosing: Faucet that is opened by pressure of the top of an operating spindle and is closed under the action of a spring or weight when the pressure is released.\X\0D TimedSelfClosing: \X\09Self closing faucet that discharges for a predetermined period of time\X\0D .

PropertyDef.Name: FaucetTopDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the operating mechanism/top of the faucet.

PropertyDef.Name: FaucetType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the range of faucet types that may be specified where:\X\0D \X\0D Bib:\X\09 Faucet with a horizontal inlet and a nozzle that discharges downwards.\X\0D Globe:\X\09 Faucet fitted through the end of a bath, with a horizontal inlet, a partially spherical body and a vertical nozzle.\X\0D Diverter: \X\09Combination faucet assembly with a valve to enable the flow of mixed water to be transferred to a showerhead.\X\0D DividedFlowCombination:\X\09 Combination faucet assembly in which hot and cold water are kept separate until emerging from a common nozzle\X\0D .\X\0D Pillar:\X\09 Faucet that has a vertical inlet and a nozzle that discharges downwards\X\0D .\X\0D SingleOutletCombination =\X\09 Combination faucet assembly in which hot and cold water mix before emerging from a common nozzle\X\0D .\X\0D Spray:\X\09 Faucet with a spray outlet\X\0D .\X\0D SprayMixing:\X\09 Spray faucet connected to hot and cold water supplies that delivers water at a temperature determined during use.

PropertyDef.Name: Finish
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the finish applied to the faucet.
